s: Based on the best-selling videogame, this all-star action-adventure follows a ragtag team of misfits on a mission to save a missing girl who holds the key to unimaginable power.

I now know why gaming is such addictive fun. I`m still learning all the gaming skills required and fully appreciate what it takes to become a proficient player. I tried various games to start me off, but then I discovered Borderlands and have been totally hooked ever since.

I am not sure how they could have messed up such a great story with such a lame ending. I also did not like the checkpoint save system, as I am an adult and sometimes I need to stop playing to deal with reality at inconvenient times. Overall, though, I really enjoyed Borderlands and had a lot ...
